title: Intensive Short-Term Piano Education Program Based on Therapeutic Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher piano proficiency and foundational scientific knowledge
context.additional_context: Content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, focusing on reducing daily stress while enhancing musical expressiveness

learning_goals: Learners can effectively express emotions in piano performances using therapeutic storytelling techniques.
Learners can perform storytelling-based music creation activities provided on mobile platforms with over 80% completion accuracy.
Learners can objectively analyze their musical expressiveness and changes in emotional responses through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
